1370: Wigherus moved to De Vyver.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Siburgis at age 26 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Nannen, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Waldrada, at age 29.
1377: Lost son Herman when Herman was 0 years old.
Siburgis gave birth to their stillborn son Herman in 1377.
1378: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Clementia, at age 34.
1381: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Gertrudis, at age 37.
1382: Lost daughter Waldrada when Waldrada was 10 years old.
1383: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Emmelina, at age 39.
Lost daughter Gertrudis when Gertrudis was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 4 years old.
